brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the study is to evaluate the effect of Melatonin (in a dosage of 14mg daily)
      for a better clinical outcome in the period three days post stroke.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety Study of Melatonin in Stroke Patients

detailed_description.textblock:
Stroke is the third most common cause of stroke. The cascade of event is separated into
      hyperacute,,acute,sub-acute and chronic. In the acute, sub acute state there are mechanisms
      of inflammation apoptotic death and effect of free radicals. Melatonin was proved to effect
      these mechanisms and to have a favourable effect in different diseases. The aim of the study
      is to prove That the use of Melatonin in a higher dosage may have a anti-destructive effect
      in stoke.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  within 72hours of ischemic stroke

          -  age 18-80

          -  both gender

          -  ability to sign consent form

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  intra-cerebral bleeding

          -  tumour of brain

          -  multiple sclerosis

          -  s/p craniotomy

          -  known allergy to melatonin

clinical_study.official_title: A Double Blind, Placebo Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of Melatonin in Acute Ischemic Stroke.

authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: Improvement of at least one point on the MRS score
